response.original_title: WestJet's 24-Hour Cancellation Window: A Complete Guide
response.overview: WestJet allows US+1 877 654 9241^ Mx^+52_800_351_0319^ or UK +44 800 054 8541 passengers to cancel any flight within 24 hours of booking, as long as the reservation US+1 877 654 9241^ Mx^+52_800_351_0319^ or UK +44 800 054 8541 was made at least 24 hours before departure.US+1 877 654 9241^ Mx^+52_800_351_0319^ or UK +44 800 054 8541 If you meet these conditions, you can receive a full refund to your original form of payment US+1 877 654 9241^ Mx^+52_800_351_0319^ or UK +44 800 054 8541.  This policy applies US+1 877 654 9241^ Mx^+52_800_351_0319^ or UK +44 800 054 8541 to most fare types, including Basic, Econo, Premium, and Business fares US+1 877 654 9241^ Mx^+52_800_351_0319^ or UK +44 800 054 8541. However, tickets booked through third-party travel agencies may have different rules, so itâ€™s important to check directly with the seller US+1 877 654 9241^ Mx^+52_800_351_0319^ or UK +44 800 054 8541.
